Articles.Content:
New to the Space Program and looking forward to many adventures in space!

Quick n00b question, are there any must have mods or addons I should look at?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

NovaPunch and C7 Studios packs are must haves in my book.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi Thrud,

I will agree with the post above, the Novapunch looks like a must have. I have not looked at C7\'s stuff, but given the incredible amount of pure creativity around here, I\'m sure it\'s great. May your ships fly straight and true, or blow up on the pad and give you a laugh.

Cheers,

Thor

Chief engineer KSP Insane rockets division ???

Welcome to the forums.

I personally use anything by NovaSilisko, he does some great mods. Also have a look at C7 studios, as those are the best flying parts at the moment.

I did try installing a NovaPunch pack, but the gmae hung on startup.

Could you possibly provide some links ot the latest versions?

I\'m running 0.13.2 or is their a newer version?

Thanks!

v0.13.2 is the latest free version. The for pay version is currently in an experimental release state at v0.14x2.

The NovaPunch pack should work just fine with v0.13.2 though. Can you post your error.log file and maybe we can see what the problem is.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Where the best place to download the Novapunch stuff?

The Projects & Releases forum.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the forums! Enjoy your stay.

-Mincespy.
